alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 11 at 4:57AM AKDT until August 11 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility as low as one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. Kenai and Soldotna areas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities will improve later this morning. Patchy dense fog is possible along the Sterling Highway between Homer and Kenai. Quarter mile or less visibility has been observed in Kenai and Soldotna.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
